page.title: 13VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content:
The questions asked here were aimed at finding out peoples expectations for and disapointment with{SOUTH KILWORTH}
{ 94}familes wanted a speed limit { 1}family did not want a speed limit {7}did not have any view {STREET LIGHTING} {1}family thought it was better than necessary { 68}families thought it was adaquate { 25}families thought it was not adaquate { 8}families had no mention. Of the{25}families who thought the lighting inadequate, {21}said there were not enough lights generally, {1}said the lights were not repaired quickly enough {3}did'nt offer a reason for thier inadequacy.
